title: Privacy Policy

sections.title: Overview
sections.content: Delaware DSA is committed to protecting your privacy and being transparent about how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. This privacy policy explains our data practices for the Delaware DSA website and our organizing activities.

sections.title: Organization Information
sections.content: Delaware DSA is a local chapter of the Democratic Socialists of America, a member-run democratic socialist organization. We are committed to advancing democratic socialist values and organizing for political and economic justice.

sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect information in several ways to support our organizing and communication efforts:

subsections.title: Contact Forms
subsections.content: When you submit our contact form, we collect:
items: Your name
Email address
Subject line (optional)
Message content
Timestamp of submission

subsections.title: Event Photography
subsections.content: At Delaware DSA events, we may collect:
items: Your name and email address for photo release forms
Visual likeness through photography at public events
Consent preferences for use of your image

subsections.title: Newsletter Subscriptions
subsections.content: For our newsletter, we may collect:
items: Email address
Name (if provided)
Subscription preferences
Engagement metrics (opens, clicks)

subsections.title: Website Usage
subsections.content: We automatically collect certain technical information:
items: IP address
Browser type and version
Pages visited and time spent
Referring website
Device and operating system information

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
sections.content: We use the information we collect for the following purposes:
items: Responding to your inquiries and contact form submissions
Sending newsletters and updates about Delaware DSA activities
Organizing events and campaigns
Creating promotional materials using event photography (with consent)
Improving our website and digital organizing tools
Communicating with members and supporters about DSA activities

sections.title: Data Retention
sections.content: We retain different types of information for different periods based on our organizing needs and legal requirements:

subsections.title: Contact Form Data
subsections.content: Contact form submissions are retained for up to 18 months to allow us to respond to your inquiry and follow up as needed.

subsections.title: Photo Release Forms
subsections.content: Photo release forms and consent records are retained indefinitely or until you withdraw consent, as they serve as legal documentation for our use of your image.

subsections.title: Newsletter Data
subsections.content: Newsletter subscription data is retained until you unsubscribe or request deletion.

subsections.title: Website Analytics
subsections.content: Technical website usage data is retained for up to 24 months for analysis and improvement purposes.

sections.title: How We Share Your Information
sections.content: Delaware DSA does not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information in the following limited circumstances:
items: With national DSA for membership coordination and organizing support
With trusted service providers who help us operate our website and communications (like email services)
When required by law or to protect our legal rights
With other progressive organizations for coalition work, only with your explicit consent

sections.title: Security Measures
sections.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information:
items: Secure transmission of data using HTTPS encryption
Regular security updates and patches
Access controls limiting who can view personal information
Secure hosting infrastructure with backup systems
Regular review of our security practices

sections.title: Your Rights and Choices
sections.content: You have several rights regarding your personal information:
items: **Access**: Request a copy of the personal information we have about you
**Correction**: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete information
**Deletion**: Request deletion of your personal information (subject to our legitimate organizing needs)
**Opt-out**: Unsubscribe from newsletters or withdraw consent for photography
**Portability**: Request your data in a commonly used format
sections.contact_info: To exercise these rights, contact us at delaware.socialists@gmail.com

sections.title: Cookies and Tracking
sections.content: Our website uses minimal tracking technologies:
items: Essential cookies required for website functionality
Analytics cookies to understand how visitors use our site (anonymized data)
No advertising or marketing cookies from third parties
No cross-site tracking or profiling

sections.title: Third-Party Services
sections.content: We use the following third-party services that may collect information:

services.name: Action Network (ActionNetwork.org)
services.purpose: Sending newsletters and responding to contact forms
services.privacy_policy: Subject to our email provider's privacy policy

services.name: Website Hosting (Vercel)
services.purpose: Hosting our website and ensuring uptime

services.name: Content Management (WordPress)
services.purpose: Managing website content through headless WordPress
services.privacy_policy: Subject to our hosting provider's privacy policy

sections.title: Children's Privacy
sections.content: Our website and services are not directed to children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we learn that we have collected information from a child under 13, we will delete that information promptly.

sections.title: Changes to This Policy
sections.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify users of material changes by posting the updated policy on our website with a new 'Last Updated' date. Continued use of our website after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

sections.title: Contact Us About Privacy
sections.content: If you have questions about this privacy policy or our data practices, please contact us:

legalNotice: This privacy policy is effective as of the date listed above and applies to all information collected by Delaware DSA through our website and organizing activities.
